comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Marion Gaynor (b. 1897) was the fourth daughter of New York City Mayor William Jay Gaynor (1849-1913), the only New York mayor (so far) to be the target of an assassination attempt (he recovered enough to resume the duties of his office, but died three years later from the after-effects of his injuries). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Jay_Gaynor Marion Gaynor was in the news in 1914 when she married real estate heir Ralph Heyward Isham, in a simple service reflecting her mourning status four months after the Mayor's death. The Ishams were reported separated in 1915, and were divorced in 1920.

comment.author: 87205882@N00
comment._content: Mrs. Gaynor-Isham reported improving in an article clipped from the 1914 February 10 edition of the Los Angeles Examiner in the Claremont Colleges Digital Library ccdl.libraries.claremont.edu/u?/lsc,3879
